node.name: The-Self-Healing-AWS-Infrastructure
node.description: The Self Healing AWS Infrastructure is a Site Reliability Engineering [SRE]-based project. It consists of a Python Script and Terraform configuration which work together with an AWS EC2 Instance to "heal" the EC2 Instance during downtime by re-deploying it with the pre-existing configurations...
